Name: Cave Racer
About the game: Cave Racer is a sidescroller single player game where the goal is to make it to the finish line by dodging obstacles and collecting gems which can later be used to buy powers or to buy skins. You control a little triangle and can move it up/down and back/forth. Depending on which difficulty you are playing on the obstacles will come at you at a high speed, your task is to simply not hit them (harder than it sounds). Cave Racer feature three levels that all have different difficulty. There is also a infinity level where the goal is to survive as long as possible, your high score will be displayed at the main menu. Good luck!
